meanings.sent1: The alluring dress caught everyone's eye at the party.
meanings.sent2: The sunset over the ocean was truly alluring.
meanings.sent3: The alluring smell of freshly baked cookies made everyone hungry.
meanings.sent4: Her alluring smile was like a beacon in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The alluring melody of the music filled the room with joy.

meanings.definition: Having a strong pull or appeal
meanings.sent1: The alluring scent of the flowers drew in many bees.
meanings.sent2: The mysterious treasure map had an alluring aura of adventure.
meanings.sent3: The alluring call of the distant waterfall beckoned the hikers.
meanings.sent4: The alluring power of the magician's tricks mesmerized the audience.
meanings.sent5: The alluring glow of the fire kept everyone warm on the cold night.

meanings.sent1: The alluring book cover made me eager to start reading.
meanings.sent2: The alluring taste of the chocolate cake was irresistible.
meanings.sent3: The alluring promise of a surprise kept the children excited.
meanings.sent4: The alluring beauty of the artwork left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent5: The alluring charm of the old town attracted many tourists.
